name: littlellm
description: A powerful desktop AI chat application with enterprise-grade security, encrypted API key storage, and advanced features
author: LittleLLM Team

scripts.build: next build && node scripts/fix-paths.js && node scripts/copy-assets.cjs
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run build-electron && node scripts/wait-for-nextjs.js"
scripts.electron-pack: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist:win-installer: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --win --config.win.target=nsis --publish=never
scripts.dist:win-portable: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --win --config.win.target=portable --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac-dmg: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --mac --config.mac.target=dmg --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac-zip: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --mac --config.mac.target=zip --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac-universal: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --mac --universal --publish=never
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --linux --publish=never
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:build:windows: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && npm run build-electron && electron-builder --mac
scripts.analyze:webpack: npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer out/_next/static/chunks/*.js
scripts.optimize: npm run build && npm run analyze
